item.title: 欧元兑英镑汇率升至 2023 年以来最高点，结束快速上涨行情
item.description: 欧元兑英镑升至 2023 年底以来的最高水平，结束了两个月来的涨势，支撑这一涨势的是集团的恢复性增长和有限的进一步降息前景。【原文：The euro rose to its highest level against the pound since late 2023, capping a two-month rally underpinned by the bloc’s resilient growth and the prospect of limited further interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 衡量从紧张的柴油市场中获利的项目
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 正在最大限度地提高柴油产量，以利用强劲的需求，并将考虑投资项目，使其炼油厂具有生产更多燃料的灵活性。【原文：Phillips 66 is maximizing diesel production to take advantage of strong demand and would consider investing in projects that give its refineries the flexibility to make more of the fuel.】

item.title: 报复性关税使加拿大财政支出增加
item.description: 由于联邦政府支出持续增加，加拿大对美国商品征收的报复性关税部分抵消了企业税和销售税收入的减少。【原文：Canada’s retaliatory tariffs on US goods are partially offsetting weaker revenue from corporate and sales taxes as federal government expenditures continue to rise.】

item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府正在准备一项新的紧急声明，作为对巴西征收关税的依据。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration is preparing a new emergency declaration as a basis for tariffs on Brazil, people familiar with the matter say.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称马拉维在整个计划期间拖欠非洲进出口银行款项
item.description: 总部设在华盛顿的国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，马拉维在其于 5 月终止的计划期间暂停向包括非洲进出口银行在内的商业债权人付款。【原文：Malawi suspended payments to its commercial creditors including African Export-Import Bank during its International Monetary Fund program that terminated in May, the Washington-based lender said.】

item.title: 银行家为帝斯曼动物营养部门准备 20 亿欧元债务
item.description: 随着 DSM-Firmenicgh AG 的动物营养与健康业务出售进程接近尾声，银行家们愿意为其提供高达 20 亿欧元（23 亿美元）的贷款。【原文：Bankers are willing to lend up to €2 billion ($2.3 billion) for DSM-Firmenicgh AG’s animal nutrition and health business, as the sale process draws closer to a conclusion.】

item.title: 依维柯与莱昂纳多的防务谈判取得进展，为塔塔交易铺平道路
item.description: 据知情人士透露，依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）正在就向莱昂纳多股份公司（Leonardo SpA）出售其防务部门进行深入谈判，这将满足意大利政府的要求，并为向印度塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）出售其余商用卡车业务铺平道路。【原文：Iveco Group NV is in advanced talks to sell its defense unit to Leonardo SpA, which would satisfy the demands of the Italian government and pave the way for a sale of the rest of the commercial trucking business to India’s Tata Motors Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西钢铁制造商乌西米纳斯公司面临进口激增和美国关税的风险
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商 Usiminas 表示担心，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对拉美国家征收 50%的关税，这将给其出口客户带来更多风险。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Usiminas expressed concern that US President Donald Trump’s threatened 50% levy on the Latin American country will add more risks for its exporting customers.】

item.title: 在新一轮退出浪潮中，Trafigura 的回购问题日益严重
item.description: 新一轮高管离职潮正在给创辉集团回购员工股票的承诺造成压力，而此时利润增长正出现衰退迹象。【原文：A fresh wave of senior executive departures is heaping pressure on Trafigura Group’s commitment to buy back its employees’ shares, just as a profit boom shows signs of faltering.】

item.title: 特朗普称不关注与加拿大的谈判，关税可能继续征收
